titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Education and the Workforce in the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Education and the Workforce in the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Education & the Workforce for the 118th Congress.
